column4: How can I add my university's (unofficial) mirror to the list of available package mirrors?
That's not quite what I mean.  Synaptic offers a long list of mirrors.  I want to add one to that list.  I've been grep'ing my hard drive but I can't figure out where the list is stored.
used grep; turns out the answer is "/usr/share/python-apt/templates/Ubuntu.mirrors"
